AddCustomRule.document: 增加访问控制（自定义策略）
AddCustomRule.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: waf.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AddCustomRule
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Redirect": "/",
    "Domain": "www.test.com",
    "Name": "test",
    "SortId": "100",
    "ExpireTime": "\"\"",
    "Edition": "clb-waf",
    "ActionType": "1",
    "Strategies": [
        {
            "Content": "\"\"",
            "Field": "COOKIE",
            "CompareFunc": "null",
            "Arg": "\"\""
        }
    ]
}
AddCustomRule.title: 添加访问控制（自定义策略）

AddCustomWhiteRule.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: waf.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AddCustomWhiteRule
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Name": "test",
    "SortId": "100",
    "ExpireTime": "",
    "Domain": "waf.tencentcloudapi.com",
    "Bypass": "",
    "Strategies": [
        {
            "Field": "COOKIE",
            "CompareFunc": "eq",
            "Content": "abc",
            "Arg": ""
        }
    ]
}
AddCustomWhiteRule.title: 增加精准白名单规则

AddDomainWhiteRule.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: waf.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AddDomainWhiteRule
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Domain": "abc.qcloudwaf.com",
    "Rules": [
        2
    ],
    "Url": "/aa",
    "Function": "prefix",
    "Status": 0
}
AddDomainWhiteRule.title: 增加域名规则白名单
